title: Gifts, Jobs, and Parties with Producers Greg and Schulte
description: Gifts! Jobs! Parties! All three are alive and well in Pawnee. Today producers Greg and Schulte reflect on their time with Parks and Recollection, talk with legendary Parks and Rec prop creator Gay Perello, and plot their own podcast spin-off! All of this and a really fun, extremely unique giveaway for a lucky Parks and Recreation super-fan, on today's BONUS episode!
author: parks-and-recollection@teamcoco.com (Team Coco and Stitcher)
